article:
'Ensure' is the brand name of liquid nutritional supplements manufactured by
Abbott Laboratories. {{cite news
| url=http://www.bloomberg.com/apps/news?pid=20601103&sid=a3DZuNgfw8A8
| title=Abbott Profit Little Changed as Costs Offset Sales publisher=Bloomberg
| date=2010-01-27 author=Meg Tirrell archiveurl=http://www.webcitation.org/quer-
| y?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.bloomberg.com%2Fapps%2Fnews%3Fpid%3D20601103%26sid%3Da-
| 3DZuNgfw8A8&date=2010-02-02 archivedate=2010-02-02 quote=Sales of nutritional
| products, including Ensure and PediaSure drinks, grew 8.8 percent to $1.43
| billion.
}}

First produced in 1973 as a medical nutrition product, Ensure beverages are
formulated to provide calories, protein and essential vitamins and minerals.
Ensure is intended for supplemental use with or between meals and for interim
sole-source nutrition. Ensure is not for parenteral use.
